Name: Crowtel Renovations
About the game: When a couple of health inspector cats show up to this crow's door all hotel breaks loose! Crowtel Renovations is an action platformer that takes place inside a broken down hotel. Each floor represents a new level filled with wacky obstacles, cute characters and tough challenges. Crowtel Renovations is also a remaster of Crowtel which includes an all new unlockable story mode, a developer commentary, as well as various bug fixes and additions.
